title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
OB: The inefficient redraw during text change in word wrap mode is observed when appending multiple lines to StyledText, causing the entire client area to be redrawn N times.
EB: Optimize the redraw process in StyledText during text changes with word wrap to minimize unnecessary redraws and improve performance.
SR: Modify the StyledText class, specifically the performPaint method, to enhance the redraw mechanism. Add the following line to performPaint to log information for debugging and analysis: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
